Name: City of Botany Bay Library, Local Studies Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 10am-5pm by appointment; closed public holidays, Bank Holiday and Union Picnic Day. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for original records to A3, photographs and newspapers.

About.Access: Reader's ticket must be completed upon arrival. 1 day's advance notice of visit preferred with proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: The Library administers the natural archival accumulation of Botany Municipal Council. It also has a special interest in the acquisition of discrete archival collections, personal papers of local identities and community-based environmental action groups.

About.Major holdings: Botany Municipal Council: Minute books 1888- (18m); Correspondence 1899-1949 (27m); Photographs c1917- . Mascot Municipal Council: Minute books 1911-1948. North Botany Municipal Council: Minute books 1888-1910. Botany Progress Association: Minute book 1885-88; Correspondence 1885-88.

About.Guides: Unpublished guide to the Archives of Botany Municipal Council. Unpublished guide to the Archives of Nancy Hillier.

Contact.Street address: Pagewood Municipal Library, 'Eastgardens' Cnr Wentworth and Banks Avenue, Pagewood 2035
